Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Berteau
ShortDescription: #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero then resume their normal route on Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Clark/Lake due to door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Clark/Lake due to door problem. Crews working to restore service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
